definition: Yang Jiechi (1950-), Chinese politician and diplomat, foreign minister of PRC 2007-2013

sentences.english: Today, our relations stand at a new starting point in history.
sentences.chinese: 杨洁篪最后说，中印关系正站在一个新的历史起点上。

sentences.english: On the same day, Yang held talks with his Gabonese counterpart Paul Toungui.
sentences.chinese: 同日，杨洁篪与加蓬外长通吉举行会谈。

sentences.english: On the same day, Ukraine's Parliament Speaker Volodymyr Lytvyn met with Yang Jiechi in the parliament building.
sentences.chinese: 同日，乌克兰议长利特温在议会大厦会见杨洁篪。

sentences.english: People of China and Kyrgyzstan shared profound traditional friendship, said Yang.
sentences.chinese: 杨洁篪表示，中吉两国人民有着深厚的传统友谊。

sentences.english: Yang noted that China and Turkey enjoy a long history of friendly exchanges.
sentences.chinese: 杨洁篪表示，中国与土耳其友好交往源远流长。

sentences.english: Prince Faisal expressed warm welcome for Yang's visit, saying that Jordan and China share very strong bilateral ties with fruitful cooperation in economy, trade and other fields.
sentences.chinese: 费萨尔热情欢迎杨洁篪访问约旦。

sentences.english: Yang expressed welcome for Baird's visit and congratulated him for assuming his new office.
sentences.chinese: 杨洁篪欢迎贝尔德来华访问并祝贺其履新。

sentences.english: Yang also took questions form the journalists on China-Japan relations and the Korean Peninsula nuclear issue.
sentences.chinese: 杨洁篪还就中日关系和朝核问题回答了记者提问。

sentences.english: Yang said recent years have witnessed smooth development of bilateral strategic partnership.
sentences.chinese: 杨洁篪说，近年来，中墨战略伙伴关系发展顺利。

sentences.english: Foreign Minister Yang Jiechi has sent a message of condolences to his Argentine counterpart Timerman.
sentences.chinese: 杨洁篪外长就此向阿根廷外长蒂梅尔曼发了唁电。

sentences.english: Yang first sent Alor warm congratulations on the independence and establishment of the Republic of South Sudan.
sentences.chinese: 杨洁篪首先热烈祝贺南苏丹独立建国。

sentences.english: Chinchilla asked Yang to convey her greetings to President Hu Jintao.
sentences.chinese: 钦奇利亚请杨洁篪转达致胡锦涛主席的问候。

sentences.english: Matsumoto just out the same day with the Chinese Foreign Minister Yang Jiechi held a telephone meeting.
sentences.chinese: 松本刚明当天还与中国外长杨洁篪进行了电话会谈。

sentences.english: Batbold is visiting China at the invitation of Foreign Minister Yang Jiechi.
sentences.chinese: 巴特包勒德是应杨洁篪外长邀请访华。

sentences.english: “China will never seek to advance its interests at the expense of others, ” Mr. Yang said, according to Reuters.
sentences.chinese: 据路透社报道，杨洁篪说，”中国不会损人利已。

sentences.english: Yang met with Japanese Foreign Minister Seiji Maehara in Hanoi on that morning.
sentences.chinese: 杨洁篪当天上午在河内会见了日本外务大臣前原诚司。

definition: foreign minister/secretary of state/minister of foreign affairs
summit talks/discussion between heads of state
Lavrov (name)/Sergey Viktorovich Lavrov (1950-), Russian diplomat and politician, Foreign minister from 2004
Mike Pence (1959-), US Republican politician, US vice president from 2017
Li Keqiang (1955-), PRC politician, prime minister from 2013
António Guterres (1949-), secretary-general of the United Nations (2017-), prime minister of Portugal (1995-2002)
